mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bk_bookclass (classID, bookClassName, bookClassImg, methodID, company, author, version, sellPrice, borrowPrice) VALUES (#{classID},#{bookClassName},#{bookClassImg}, #{methodID},#{company},#{author}, #{version},#{sellPrice},#{borrowPrice})
mapper.update: UPDATE bk_bookclass SET classID=#{classID}, bookClassName=#{bookClassName}, bookClassImg=#{bookClassImg}, methodID=#{methodID}, company=#{company}, author=#{author}, version=#{version}, sellPrice=#{sellPrice}, borrowPrice=#{borrowPrice} WHERE bookClassID=#{bookClassID}
